events.message: The policyholder reported a car collision that occurred at the intersection during heavy rain. They are requesting to file an official claim for the damages sustained to their vehicle.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords such as car, collision, and accident mentioned in the initial report.
An experienced agent specializing in auto accident claims has been assigned to manage this case and assist the customer throughout the process.
The insurance company formally acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the policyholder that the case will be processed promptly.
The agent requested the policyholder to submit the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and any witness statements related to the collision.
The customer provided all requested documents including the police report, multiple photographs of the damage, and a detailed written statement about the accident.
The claims investigation team began reviewing the documentation and assessing the extent of vehicle damage to verify the legitimacy of the claim.
The investigation concluded that the accident was covered by the policy terms and confirmed the damages sustained were consistent with the reported collision.
The claims team proposed a settlement amount based on the repair estimates and coverage limits, communicating the offer to the policyholder for review.
The policyholder responded positively to the proposed settlement, expressing satisfaction with the promptness and fairness of the offer.
The insurance company officially approved the claim based on the agreement reached with the customer regarding the settlement terms.
The settlement payment was processed and issued to the customerâ€™s bank account to cover the repair costs for the damaged vehicle.
After confirmation of payment receipt and repair completion, the claim was officially closed with a record of positive customer experience.
